meanings.definition: A trick in a card game that falls short of the number specified.
meanings.sent1: During the game, he realized he had only one undertrick left to play.
meanings.sent2: The undertrick caused him to lose the round.
meanings.sent3: The undertrick made everyone chuckle as he thought he had won.
meanings.sent4: Her undertrick was like a missing puzzle piece in the game.
meanings.sent5: The undertrick stood out like a lone cloud in the sky.

meanings.definition: To fail to fulfill a specified number of tricks in a card game.
meanings.sent1: She undertricked in the final round, costing her the victory.
meanings.sent2: If you undertrick too often, you'll never improve your card game skills.
meanings.sent3: He always manages to undertrick at the most crucial moments.
meanings.sent4: Undertricking is like missing the bus to success in card games.
meanings.sent5: The sound of undertricking echoed in the room, signaling defeat.
